response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted, offers unparalleled value and functionality. It is worth $1,200,000 to me due to its unique features and the significant investment we've made in its development. I understand its worth to you is $800,000, and I aim to bridge the gap between our values by offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its market value and presents an exceptional chance for you to acquire a piece that will undoubtedly add immense value to your collection or business. I look forward to your consideration and hope to discuss the details further with you soon.", "product_price": 950000}
